dialogue.introduction: I'm torpedo cruiser Ooi. By the way, I wonder where Kitakami-san is.
dialogue.library_intro: It's Ooi, torpedo cruiser edition. My torpedo powers were counted in, but I didn't have much of the limelight. I'll show you what I'm made of this time. Keep your eyes open!
dialogue.secretary1: Is this some sort of drill?
dialogue.secretary2: Kitakami-san? Ah, Commander, what is the matter?
dialogue.secretary3: You like them too, Admiral? Yes, I have a lot attached to my legs! ...but you've touched them too much, so how about eating 20 of them?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Will Kitakami-san be alright?..... I'm getting worried as I'm not with her... Hmm... I'm so worried... It's definitely, yes, there's definitely something that's about to happen! I have to go now!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral? What happened to the other girls, you say? Eh...? That's not it? Hmm, it's okay then.. It's okay...
dialogue.wedding: Of the two Torpedo cruisers, you chose me, right?... If you betray me, I'll sink you in the ocean, you know...
dialogue.show_players_score: It seems there is a message for you, Admiral.
dialogue.equipment1: These Type-93 Oxygen Torpedoes are so cool... and marvelous.
dialogue.equipment2: I want to be able use my torpedoes to their maximum abilities.
dialogue.equipment3: If Kitakami is fine with it, go ahead.
dialogue.expedition_selection: If Kitakami is fine with it, go ahead.
dialogue.resource_collection: If Kitakami is fine with it, go ahead.
dialogue.instant_repair: If Kitakami is fine with it, go ahead.
dialogue.development: If Kitakami is fine with it, go ahead.
dialogue.supply: Yep, be sure to pack me with fuel and torpedoes okay? Fufu, this way I can fight again.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Yes, I'll be taking a short break.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: That strategy was horrible... No, sorry for my incompetence.
dialogue.docking_complete: That's right, a ship is fully repaired.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new friend has joined our fleet.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The campaign has ended. Good work.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Now, let's go and fire these oxygen torpedoes up!
dialogue.night_battle: Who's the one that hurt Kitakami?
dialogue.mvp: I'm the one? Aww, I'm loss for words♪ Eh, Kitakami-san...? Did Kitakami-san see that!? Did she!?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Oh no! My torpedo tubes are in tatters now!
dialogue.sunk: I guess it isn't bad... to sink as a Torpedo Cruiser...
dialogue.end_of_year_2014: Geez, why is the end of the year is such a busy time... ah, cleaning, I will do my best!
dialogue.new_year_2015: Kitakami-san, Happy New Year! This year-... Oh, Admiral? I will be in your care again this year too. Yep!
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Va-Valentine's.... Surely this year will be the decisive battle! Ufufu, fufu....uu?! Ah, my nose is bleeding! Ahahaha....
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Today's an important day! During a day like this, it's the best to spend the day with Kitakami-san! Kitakami-saaann!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Summer is very soon isn't it? Got to go buy a matching set of (similarly styled as Kitakami's) swimsuits. Ufufuufufufu

hourly.0000: Admiral, midnight has just came around again. It's late night.
hourly.0100: The time is currently at 0100. Eh...? It sounds too strict? I-I see...
hourly.0200: The time is――... Ah, I mean, it's 0200. Do you prefer it like this, Admiral?
hourly.0300: 0300. ...Geez, so annoying. Being picky even in the way I make the hourly announcements... N-Nothing! It's 0300, sir!
hourly.0400: It's 04...00... Admiral? Admiral...? Did he go to sleep? ...THIS IS MY CHANCE!
hourly.0500: 0500. I need to go to Kitakami-san's side!! Yes, she is definitely troubled! Kitakami-saaaaaaaaaan!!
hourly.0600: 0600! Kitakami-san, are you okay, are you safe!? I-it looks like you're fine... Eh? This knife? Ah, it's for making breakfast...
hourly.0700: 07,00... Yes, I was thinking, of preparing, breakfast... For today's miso soup, are you okay with gluten?
hourly.0800: 0800. Alright, for Kitakami-san's sake, I made breakfast with a quality that is above my skill level! Please go ahead and eat up♪ ...It's delicious? I'm relieved♪
hourly.0900: 0900. Eh, shouldn't I return to my post? But...
hourly.1000: 1000. Admiral, I'm back... Where did I go? ...Isn't it obvious, of course it's to Kitakami-san's place!!
hourly.1100: 1100. Um... Admiral? Why are you holding your head like that? Did you get a flu!? Let's see, where is the flu medicine...
hourly.1200: It's 1200. It is now noon. Should I make some lunch? It's fine. I'm good at cooking.
hourly.1300: 1300. Go on, eat up! Eh? What is this...? It's obviously omelette rice! Should I write something with the ketchup?
hourly.1400: It's 1400. What is it, Admiral? What's with that look of doubt on your face. I didn't do anything like poison your lunch, you know? How rude.
hourly.1500: 1500. It's about time to seriously go out for some sorties now I guess. ..Yes, I'll do my best!
hourly.1600: 1600. Um... For the expedition, what should the fleet do, Admiral?
hourly.1700: It's 1700. Oh my, It's nearly dinner time. I'll prepare dinner food for a while.
hourly.1800: The time is currently at 1800. What kind of pot is this, you ask? It's certainly, my special curry, fulfilled with my love! I'm leaving!
hourly.1900: 1900. Kitakami-san♪ I just accidentally cook too much curry! If you don't mind, let's eat togetheeeeR!
hourly.2000: 2000. See, there's a curry for Admiral too. Eh? It's delicious...? Your body is getting hotter? You see?
hourly.2100: It is now 2100. Let's see, we're done washing up, the area around the fire is okay too. Good work for today, Admiral. Fuu...
hourly.2200: 2200. Tsk, That one light cruiser is making such a noise A―GAIN... Admiral, Can I go to complain her? Ah, O...Okay?
hourly.2300: 2300. Admiral, Thank you for your hard work today. Is Kitakami-san already sleeping?
